# Xml Docs

## Accessing XML

- [Accessing XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/accessing-xml.md): Learn more about: Accessing XML in Visual Basic
- [How to: Access XML Descendant Elements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-descendant-elements.md): Learn more about: How to: Access XML Descendant Elements (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Access XML Child Elements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-child-elements.md): Learn more about: How to: Access XML Child Elements (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Access XML Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-attributes.md): Learn more about: How to: Access XML Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Declare and Use XML Namespace Prefixes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-declare-and-use-xml-namespace-prefixes.md): Learn more about: How to: Declare and Use XML Namespace Prefixes (Visual Basic)

## Creating XML

- [Creating XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/creating-xml.md): Learn more about: Creating XML in Visual Basic
- [XML Literals Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/xml-literals-overview.md): Learn more about: XML Literals Overview (Visual Basic)
- [Embedded Expressions in XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/embedded-expressions-in-xml.md): Learn more about: Embedded Expressions in XML (Visual Basic)
- [Names of Declared XML Elements and Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/names-of-declared-xml-elements-and-attributes.md): Learn more about: Names of Declared XML Elements and Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [XML Literals and the XML 1.0 Specification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/xml-literals-and-the-xml-1-0-specification.md): Learn more about: XML Literals and the XML 1.0 Specification (Visual Basic)
- [White Space in XML Literals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/white-space-in-xml-literals.md): Learn more about: White Space in XML Literals (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Create XML Literals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-create-xml-literals.md): Learn more about: How to: Create XML Literals (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Embed Expressions in XML Literals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-embed-expressions-in-xml-literals.md): Learn more about: How to: Embed Expressions in XML Literals (Visual Basic)

## Manipulating XML

- [Manipulating XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/manipulating-xml.md): Learn more about: Manipulating XML in Visual Basic

- [How to: Transform XML by Using LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-transform-xml-by-using-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Transform XML by Using LINQ (Visual Basic)

## XML in Visual Basic

- [XML in Visual Basic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/index.md): Learn how to use XML and LINQ to XML features in your Visual Basic code.
- [Overview of LINQ to XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/overview-of-linq-to-xml.md): Learn more about: Overview of LINQ to XML in Visual Basic
